explanation: [0-0] In a shopping mall, a man wearing a black top, jeans, and a crossbody bag is leading a little girl with blonde hair, who is wearing a white top and jeans. In front of them is a woman holding a baby, wearing a plaid shirt and camel-colored shoes. She is holding a baby bottle in her right hand, looking at the baby in her arms. In the middle left of the screen, a white "TikTok" caption and logo appear, along with a white "ahsheva" watermark.

[0-3] Then, the man leading the little girl and the woman gradually approach each other. As the camera switches to show the front of the man and the girl and the back of the woman, the little girl raises her right hand and knocks the baby bottle out of the woman's hand. Then, without looking back, she walks out of the right side of the screen. The woman turns her head to look at the two and then looks down at the baby bottle on the ground. As she bends down to pick up the baby bottle, she watches the two walk out of the right side of the screen. Behind the woman is parked a black vintage car. In front of the car stands a man wearing a blue plaid shirt, black pants, and black shoes. Behind the car is a red telephone booth.
